name: Stygian Desolator
description: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.

abilities.name: Greater Corruption
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks apply an armor reducing debuff on enemy units.
notes: The bonus armor reduction value does not stack
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Affects allied units, buildings, and ward-type units
Weaker sources do not reduce armor if a stronger source is present, except for Desolator and Stygian Desolator, which stack with each other
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the armor reduction is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
Has specific attack projectile modifying priority among similar items
The ability effects are applied in order: the desolator_2_buff, then the wielder's attack instance
